turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, can i help you with anything?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I'd like to order a Starbucks Cafe Mocha venti with whole milk and whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you said you wanted a venti caffe mocha with whole milk and whipped cream, correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, let me order that for you, one moment.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, i have ordered you a venti caffe mocha with whole milk and whipped cream to be picked up at the starbucks in westlake, daly city, ca, correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your receipt will be texted to you and your order will be ready for pickup in 5 minutes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help you with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No. Thank you for your help.
